explains: n. 黄油奶糖；焦糖（用于食品着色和调味）；焦糖色，浅褐色

sentences.en: This is the exhibition of chocolate and caramel art.
sentences.cn: 这是一组巧克力和焦糖制成的艺术品展览。

sentences.en: Once the milk sauce can cover the spoon, stir in the cold caramel.
sentences.cn: 牛奶酱覆盖勺子时，就搅进冷焦糖。

sentences.en: In fact, studies show that the caramel we use does not cause cancer.
sentences.cn: 事实上，调查表明我们饮料中使用的焦糖色素不会致癌。
